dcterms:description: ScanNetV2 is a richly-annotated dataset containing 3D reconstructions of indoor scenes, which includes RGB images, groundtruth depths, camera poses, surface reconstructions, and instance-level semantic segmentations.
dcterms:title: ScanNetV2
